import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Formik, Field, Form } from "formik"; import PriceCards from "../views/PriceCards"; import ServiceDetailCards from "../views/ServiceDetailCards"; const UserAccount = () => { const [showAccountModal, setshowAccountModal] = useState(false); const [showServiceSettings, setshowServiceSettings] = useState(false); return (

) : (

); }; export default UserAccount;
